title: Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site: Suggested Reading
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Suggested Reading                Suggested Reading       Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site Suggested Reading ___________________________________________________________ For Teachers: General Reading Casting Her Own Shadow: Eleanor Roosevelt and the Shaping of Postwar Liberalism by Allida M. Black (Columbia University Press, 1996). ISBN: 0-231-10404-9 The Eleanor Roosevelt Encyclopedia edited by Maurine H, Beasley, Holly C. Shulman and Henry R. Beasley (Greenwood Press, 2001).
